attributes.title: Very Unreliable
attributes.review: I have been using this all for transportation. My rides never show up and the GPS led me to an abandoned crack house. I deleted the app for a while and I recently came back to give this app another shot. I tried to walk my dog with this app but it led me to a slaughterhouse. Again, very dangerous.
